column6: Removed wrapped line. No cutlass play. Paint failing near waterline. Light horizontal crack along port keel joint. Some gouging into gelcoat around cutlass. Installed a one-inch streamlined shaft anode (MTY-CMX01, $12)
Heavy barnacle gowth around waterline, esp port quarter. Heavy slime above waterline in same area. Installed a one-inch streamlined shaft anode (MTY-CMX01, $12)
Heavy slime above bottom paint waterline on port aft quarter. Installed a one-inch streamlined shaft anode (MTY-CMX01, $12)
Paint has failed. Time for haulout! Replaced shaft anode.
